website_summaries.verdict: This catcher's set features an impressive look and is designed to be a starter set for younger players.
pros: This set comes with a chest protector, leg guards, and a helmet and is available in a wide range of dynamic color schemes
It is made from lightweight but tough materials that can keep your child protected while allowing nearly unrestricted movement
cons: The sizing can run a little small, especially in the helmet, so consider getting a larger set

customer_reviews.title: Haters gonna hate
customer_reviews.text: The people giving this gear bad reviews obviously know nothing about catching and just like to hear themselves talk a bunch of crap. This gear is great, has held up fantastic and is extremely durable. The BS about the helmet being small is lies unless your kid has an oversized melon or pumpkin for a head. The chest protector is perfect. Honestly, it would be hard to find gear this great at double the price.
customer_reviews.author: Becky

customer_reviews.title: I love that these aren't velcro
customer_reviews.text: I love that these aren't velcro. Any catcher's mom or dad knows what a pain velcro shin guards are. This fits my 9 year old nicely and keeps him protected behind the plate.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sharp looking set
customer_reviews.text: We got this set for our grandson's 12th birthday. He's in little league and was about to attend a catching camp. He was beyond thrilled to open this! We picked out the orange set. After his camp, he was picked for a team, as catcher, and it was the perfect color for his team! It fits great, easily adjusted for the perfect fit. The only thing additional we needed to purchase was the throat guard.
customer_reviews.author: Cathy M

customer_reviews.title: Amazing set. Great price.
customer_reviews.text: My son is almost 13. He had his set for 2 years. Hes catching for a pitcher that throws 75 mph. He loves this set. I ordered him a new set to match his team colors. Also I bought a set for my 10 year old last year. Im very please with this set. Would highly recommend. Yes make sure you measure your kid and get the right set.
customer_reviews.author: jared

customer_reviews.title: Very good set for the price
customer_reviews.text: This has definitely been worth the price! My daughter is a very small 11 y.o. weighing about 62lbs. Her only "complaint" has been the helmet is a little snug.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Great fit for 10y girl
customer_reviews.text: The gear on my daughters softball team was too big, so I purchased this. Fits perfect for your average 10 year old girl. Helmet if very nice and good vision area, and she can run with the shin pads without them falling off or tripping her up now. The chest piece is a little large, so we had to knot a back strap for it to fit snug, but my daughter is on the slender side.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fits great, wrong color
customer_reviews.text: Love the gear it fits good, but was disappointed to open box today and the gear be the wrong color. Ordered black/grey (to match team colors) and received navy blue/grey. My daughter was very disappointed because she was so excited to get the new gear for her new team. We needed the gear ASAP so she had to settle for the blue and wore it tonight.
customer_reviews.author: hi

customer_reviews.title: Ok for cheap equipment but not for a serious catcher
customer_reviews.text: Wrong color was sent and we needed it ASAP so we had to return and purchase different gear directly from a store. We ended up purchasing All Star catchers gear which is made SO much better than this stuff. Yes, all star is more expensive but worth it. The Louisville helmet was uncomfortable and my son could hardly get it on/off-that can be a big problem. 😬 This is ok for some cheap equipment but I would never purchase again for a serious catcher.
customer_reviews.author: Katy

customer_reviews.title: Best price around
customer_reviews.text: I looked at a few of these specific sets and this is absoultely the lowest price. The gear is well put together and fits my 10 yr old son very well. He is a little guy too, but he will easily be able to use this set for a few years to come. The helmet adjusts out quite a bit more and so do all of the pads. He has taken a couple of shots to the ankles and shins with no issue whatsoever. Definitely recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: Gibby

customer_reviews.title: Make sure on size!!!
customer_reviews.text: Likes great and seemed put together with high quality materials. But had to send it back because it was to small. I read the reviews but ordered anyways. My boy was 10/11 years. Above average height and thick. Everything was to short, which sucked because it looked great and was priced great. If you have average or below kid, I feel it would work great for them
customer_reviews.author: Brady

customer_reviews.title: Helmet is too small for a 10 year old.
customer_reviews.text: My son is 10 yrs old and is on the short side for his age. The chest and shin protectors are perfect, but the helmet is very small. It's tight on the temples and the ears are very exposed. We really tried to make it work, but it was giving my son a headache because it was too tight. Unfortunately, we had to return the product.
customer_reviews.author: Liezl

customer_reviews.title: Helmet didn't fit
customer_reviews.text: The reviews I read made mention to the helmet not fitting only large heads, apparently my 8 year old falls into that category. The helmet doesn't fit so we opted to buy a skull cap and a face mask, the rest of the set is a great set for him, fits well and is comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Dani

customer_reviews.title: The helmet is tight, the chest pad is loose ...
customer_reviews.text: The helmet is tight, the chest pad is loose, and the shin guards are just right.. My child is an average size 9 year old so it doesn't make sense that the pieces aren't at least all small, all large, etc.
customer_reviews.author: Hochimin

customer_reviews.title: Good product but wrong color sent.
customer_reviews.text: Only problem I have with the product is they sent the wrong color I would have sent back but had a game the next day an his old gear was broken. Fits my 10 year old son perfect. Quality is good.
customer_reviews.author: Will Huggins

customer_reviews.title: Great gear for the price
customer_reviews.text: Use as team gear as our little league did not have catchers gear small enough to fit some of the kids on our minor league team. Used it for the spring and it held up well and trust me those kids were down and the dirt and the helmet was thrown many times but still in tact. Spent more than double for my older boys gear a year a go and it hasn't held up as well.
customer_reviews.author: GLN

customer_reviews.title: Nice gear
customer_reviews.text: Looks good and fits right. My 10 year old is average 10 year old size. Maybe a little skinny but everything fits good. He said the helmet is a little tight. It’s missing one of the straps for the legs so if someone can contact us to send it that would be great.
customer_reviews.author: Benabrazil

customer_reviews.title: Just what he needed
customer_reviews.text: THis was perfect, although I didn't know he needed a specific color. Seller worked with me, refunded and I returned the wrong color and reordered the correct one. All in all, a great Christmas surprise
customer_reviews.author: roxanne terramagra

customer_reviews.title: Great Catcher set!
customer_reviews.text: My son loves this set! The chest pad is a little big for a 7 year old..it still works for him.
customer_reviews.author: ldydi

customer_reviews.title: Mask Too Small; Chest Protector and Shin Guards are Great
customer_reviews.text: My 8-yr old son has caught a lot of games this summer since the COVID-19 restrictions and this gear is holding up well. He loves the chest protector and shin guards. They’re easy to get on/off and are comfortable. He did have to go with a different mask because this one was too small. I wish they’d improve the mask size. If they did this would be great gear.
customer_reviews.author: Tony B

customer_reviews.title: Sizing is accurate except helmet
customer_reviews.text: Nice colors, nice quality. Helmet is very small. I used weights to smush the padding so it would fit some 9 year olds. Some kids with larger cranium's still wont fit comfortably
customer_reviews.author: Chris H.

customer_reviews.title: The rest of the set was perfect.
customer_reviews.text: The helmet with this set is very uncomfortable. The temple padding creates too much pressure. If you have a child with a narrow head it may work for them. The rest of the set was perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl U.

customer_reviews.title: Good set
customer_reviews.text: Fits average to smaller 8 yr old. Plenty of room to grow into it. Son said helmet was a little uncomfortable at first but once broken in was fine.
customer_reviews.author: Christian A.

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what our catcher needed
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautiful color!! I love the shape and style of the helmet - all of the gear is perfect protection!!
customer_reviews.author: Delaina

customer_reviews.title: The sizing was all wrong.. chest protector was ...
customer_reviews.text: The sizing was all wrong.. chest protector was one size and the shin guards and helmet was two different sizes compared to the chart said they would fit.
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: Mask size is very small
customer_reviews.text: Seems like a quality product, but the mask seems to be WAY too small to be classified as 9-12 yrs of age. This mask was small for many of our 9-10 year olds
customer_reviews.author: ShooterMcGavin

customer_reviews.title: Sizes aren't the best.
customer_reviews.text: Helmet was too small, chest protector was too big, and shin guards were ok. Returned and went with an Adidas set instead.
customer_reviews.author: S. J.

customer_reviews.title: Great fit and protection
customer_reviews.text: My 10 year old granddaughter is very petite and hard to fit. This is the answer. Looks great too. Well built
customer_reviews.author: magicone2

customer_reviews.title: Good Set but received wrong color
customer_reviews.text: Got the set pretty quick but it was the wrong color. Wasn't able to get the right set in before the tourney. Adjusted everything on the set and it seems to fit ok, maybe a little loose around the throat area/top of chest. It is not as good as AllStar products but it will do until he grows into the other set.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew

customer_reviews.title: My son has loved this gear and had no complaints
customer_reviews.text: My son has loved this gear and had no complaints. He is on the small size so I did tape up the straps to make them shorter since they were getting in the way. Help up great in season 1 though and look awesome. Tons of padding in the chest.
customer_reviews.author: Jack

customer_reviews.title: Try if before you buy it
customer_reviews.text: Good quality and look but the helmet was way too tight and uncomfortable. The recommended age range was 9-12 and my son is 10 so I thought I would be safe buying online and no trying it on first. Wrong! He wore it one time and of course scratched the helmet so I can’t return it. We tried on other brand helmets and they fit fine.
customer_reviews.author: B. Webb

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: My 8 year old wears knee savers with this, and is doing a great job as a catcher.
customer_reviews.author: SKMG

customer_reviews.title: Great set but uncomfortable helmet
customer_reviews.text: Feet’s my 7 year old great, but he complains that the lip on the back of the helmet hurts when he try to get the helmet off let alone flip it off for a foul ball. We worked around it by him wearing a backwards baseball hat but that’s not the best solution. Overall the set looks great and can’t wait to use it this upcoming season
customer_reviews.author: Kathy Schutte

customer_reviews.title: Great catchers' gear
customer_reviews.text: Very good, high quality gear especially for the price. Seems very durable and protects what needs to be protected.
customer_reviews.author: Chris&Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Excellent durability
customer_reviews.text: After 2 years of very frequent use this gear is still in good condition. Perfect for youth catchers under 5’
customer_reviews.author: Mariealena Dagostino

customer_reviews.title: Great for 11 year old softball catcher.
customer_reviews.text: This fits my 11 year old perfect. Doesn't limit movement or flexibility. The crotch protector is removable and was a selling point for girl softball catcher.
customer_reviews.author: Todd Bryant

customer_reviews.title: Our favorite gear
customer_reviews.text: This so our second set of this gear. Holds up and breaks in really well. It’s our second set. Great value!! Will buy again and again as he grows.
customer_reviews.author: amanda

customer_reviews.title: Fits great.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for our grandson. It fits great. He likes it a lot better the the one he had last year. Would buy it again .
customer_reviews.author: Sophia

customer_reviews.title: Helmet runs small
customer_reviews.text: Helmet was too tight, it dug into my sons head, he is a small 11 year old
customer_reviews.author: Pcb

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: This is great for the 1st and 2nd grade boys. maybe beyond, but that is what we have. the kids love it. great quality
customer_reviews.author: Shelli Coffin

customer_reviews.title: nice gear
customer_reviews.text: this gear is nice and protects well. we only expect two seasons though as the material is showing wear after 1/2 season. not recommended for older than 12 or above average height 12 yrs
customer_reviews.author: Blue17

customer_reviews.title: Smaller than noted
customer_reviews.text: The equipment is great and is built really well but did come in a bit smaller than expected. My son is 8 years old and it seemed like it would not last more than a season.
customer_reviews.author: Ozzy

customer_reviews.title: Great price for good quality
customer_reviews.text: Just purchased for me 8 y/o son and he loves it. As soon as it was delivered he put it on and went out to have his older bro pitch to him. Great price!
customer_reviews.author: J. Griffith

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality
customer_reviews.text: Really love this kit over the others. Super good quality. Had to return because I purchased the wrong size. I wish they had this set in just one size smaller for an 8 year-old.
customer_reviews.author: cloud10

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy
customer_reviews.text: The helmet padding is awful. Provides no cushion at all. Very uncomfortable. Shin guards are narrow in the front leaving part of my Sons shins exposed. I’m going to attempt to return this set. Learned my lesson! I recommend Spending the additional $100 and get a good comfortable set.
customer_reviews.author: RCC3

customer_reviews.title: Solid set!
customer_reviews.text: This set is perfect for my 9-year old son who plays both travel and rec baseball. It's a well constructed set that will fit him for the next 2-3 years. Good price for a good set.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great catcher's equipment
customer_reviews.text: My son has used this for 2 baseball seasons so far. Great catcher's equipment. Color is still as vibrant as when we got it (blue) and equipment has held up very well.
customer_reviews.author: Patty

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The helmet wasn't a good fit for my son. He is 11, but either then that is was good.
customer_reviews.author: rebeca l.

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and sharp looking equipment.
customer_reviews.text: This fit well for our 10 year old. He uses it almost daily for baseball and it is holding up well and looks sharp. We bought knee savers to go with it and he says it is comfortable and easy to move in.
customer_reviews.author: Nichole Engel

customer_reviews.title: Lasting.
customer_reviews.text: My son has been playing in this for months and he likes it a lot. So much so that this is a replacement for his last gear that is the same kind. Original gear survived three years with my nephew and three years with my son. Fall and spring ball.
customer_reviews.author: Ammo Sid

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my 8 year old, room to grow in. Quality materials, nice colors.
customer_reviews.author: Steven Moreira

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for our 10 year old son.. First year catching and he killed it!! He loved his gear and that it is Braves colors was a plus!!!
customer_reviews.author: karola82

customer_reviews.title: Size of helmet is an issue.
customer_reviews.text: Great set overall but helmet runs small and did not fit my 9 year old. Check sizing before ordering
customer_reviews.author: jodi

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Cloth material on knee pads starting to wear already but my son loves his gear and great price.
customer_reviews.author: Gabe jarvis

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice gear. Son said helmet hurt his head. Cut down some pieces & now its great.
customer_reviews.author: Jac

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit
customer_reviews.text: Great fit for my 9 year old. Easy mobility and easy to get on and off.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fits my Grandson perfectly for protection.
customer_reviews.text: My grandson says he can move around in this catchers gear with no problem. He is well protected and feels comfortable too.
customer_reviews.author: Liz Cook

customer_reviews.title: Good quality for the money!!
customer_reviews.text: My son just turned 10, but is big for his age. Fits good! Had to stretch the helmet a little. The legs straps have hooks that aren’t closed so just have to make sure the straps are tight or they will come lose. But overall really good quality for the money spent!
customer_reviews.author: jerri groves

customer_reviews.title: Helmet straps are way too short. Could not use it
customer_reviews.text: Love it except helmet can not really be adjusted because straps were cut too short
customer_reviews.author: Nick Brown

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: The helmet is so small. No one on the team where's it.
customer_reviews.author: Mindy J

customer_reviews.title: great but one complaint
customer_reviews.text: Everything fit my 9 y/o perfectly except the helmet. It’s pretty sung. He can’t take it on and off without help. We had to cut out some of the padding to get it to fit.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great youth set
customer_reviews.text: Great youth catchers set. Fits my 8 year old boy very well! Very pleased with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth G.

customer_reviews.title: Helmet runs small, decent gear
customer_reviews.text: Decent gear for the price. Helmet runs small for the size. Fits about right for a youth size 8.
customer_reviews.author: Kristie W.

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Fits my 8 year old daughter with some room to grow! Was used in our state softball competition and the World Series. Matched her uniforms perfectly!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Vest too small and flimsy
customer_reviews.text: Best is way too small for a 9-12 year old as described
customer_reviews.author: Natesmom

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Fit
customer_reviews.text: My daughter is a pitcher but plays catcher now and then. She is 10, almost 5’ tall and weighs about 100lbs. This is comfortable for her and fits great. We’ve only had it for about a month so can’t speak to the durability of it yet.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ... this for my 10u baseball team and we have loved it. Much better then the gear the league ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 10u baseball team and we have loved it. Much better then the gear the league gave us.
customer_reviews.author: Bradley

customer_reviews.title: Nice equipment, great colors, at an affordable price
customer_reviews.text: Nice quality, fits my small 10 year old nice. And he should get at least two more years out of it if it
customer_reviews.author: Justin F.

customer_reviews.title: Louisville Slugger isn't just bats, their gear is awesome too!
customer_reviews.text: Nice great, this is our second set. Works well and easy on and off once you get the hang of it. Looks sharp, and comfort is good but I definitely recommend getting knee savers!
customer_reviews.author: Ella

customer_reviews.title: Looks Great
customer_reviews.text: Nice gear fits my 11yo well however he is tall and skinny. Looks great too.
customer_reviews.author: David A. Sebben

customer_reviews.title: Good deal
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my son that is 11 and plays select baseball. He loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Measure your child before ordering
customer_reviews.text: I ended up having to return this set. It was too small for my son. Seemed like really nice quality.
customer_reviews.author: Casey Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Great product and great transaction
customer_reviews.text: Great product and great transaction. A little big for my son, but great other then that
customer_reviews.author: David T Murphy

customer_reviews.title: Not actually “new”
customer_reviews.text: The only thing keeping from giving this 5 stars is that the material around the shin guards are dirty. Likely someone used them for a practice or a camp and decided to return them. Seems to be in great condition but the set I got was not “new.”
customer_reviews.author: mike130

customer_reviews.title: Order a size bigger.
customer_reviews.text: Good equipment, but smaller than stated in sizing chart. I had to buy a separate helmet for my son.
customer_reviews.author: Trapper G.

customer_reviews.title: Also great to see different colors available as well
customer_reviews.text: Wev'e used it for a month now and my little Catcher is loving it. Also great to see different colors available as well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Unreliable
customer_reviews.text: Helmet and chest protector are great. Shin guards are unusable. We can not keep them strapped tightly. We have changed the straps and still makes no difference. Each time a kid squats they come loose.
customer_reviews.author: KrazeHawk

customer_reviews.title: THE SHIN GUARDS WILL NOT STAY CLIPPED!!!
customer_reviews.text: Size chart is not good. Helmet is too small and the shin guards seemed to fit well but they kept coming unhooked and the poor little guy was struggling for 3 innings till the coach just took him out.
customer_reviews.author: Charlotte

customer_reviews.title: Daughter loves her new gear!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my 9 year old daughter on prime day. She LOVES it!!!
customer_reviews.author: laura

customer_reviews.title: Good value  for beginner
customer_reviews.text: The fit is good for a 4'-8" 70 lb 10yr old girl with some room to grow. She says it was easy to move in and was comfortable
customer_reviews.author: Happy

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Fits my 10 year old perfect. Great quality and colors
customer_reviews.author: Ashley D.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great starter set. Complete and well protected. Very good material.
customer_reviews.author: Jose and Jen

customer_reviews.title: Worth while purchase
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic. Season is a few months away. The gear fits well for a 10 years old. Looks good. Good quality. Glad we went with this gear.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Simmons

customer_reviews.title: Son loves it
customer_reviews.text: Son loves it. He put in some scratches already but it is doing well. Overall, satisfied with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Suann Moran

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Excellent. Arrived in 2 days not 1, but no worries. The youth Series 5 fit my 8 yo daughter great for softball.
customer_reviews.author: NATASHA CAREY

customer_reviews.title: FITS GREAT EXCELLENT QUALITY
customer_reviews.text: Great product! We are using it for our 5th\6th girls softball team. Our catchers are 5'-5'2" 90-100lbs. Good quality very functional.
customer_reviews.author: JZ

customer_reviews.title: They loved it: ) nice has the protective part for ...
customer_reviews.text: They loved it :) nice has the protective part for little boys that they need and is a nice quality!!!
customer_reviews.author: Molly

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size to grow in
customer_reviews.text: Equipment looked awesome fit perfect with room to grow in. will try it out on a double header this weekend 👍🏽👍🏽👌🏽👌🏽
customer_reviews.author: Greg Briones II

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff
customer_reviews.text: Good solid gear that fits just as advertised. Price was good too. Recommend for anyone looking for youth catcher gear
customer_reviews.author: Rey Rey G.

customer_reviews.title: Really nice looking set
customer_reviews.text: Really nice looking set. Just make sure the player is not under 5 foot 5 or it will be too big.
customer_reviews.author: AlanH

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My daughter uses it for softball and it works great
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: But my son like the product but it came in the wrong color
customer_reviews.text: I don't normal write reviews. But my son like the product but it came in the wrong color.
customer_reviews.author: danielle

customer_reviews.title: Looks like great quality thus far
customer_reviews.text: Looks like great quality thus far. We have not yet tested the durability of the gear on our very active son. The gear is a Christmas present. We will keep you and the public posted regarding the quality of the wear and tear, and post back this Spring. The Lindsay Family!
customer_reviews.author: aimball

customer_reviews.title: Great durability
customer_reviews.text: Great fit for my 11 year old daughter because she is between sizes
customer_reviews.author: Bobby

customer_reviews.title: I Ordered the navy blue and red and received the royal blue and grey.
customer_reviews.text: My son Loved the product after he got over the fact it was the wrong color. Luckily it was still a color that matched his team.
customer_reviews.author: Kerry McMillan

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: Very surprised with the durable material. Great quality for the price. The chest is a little to big for my 10 year old, but will last longer.
customer_reviews.author: graciela

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: This has been used for 2 years by my daughter. Cleans up well, very well made, you will get a lot of use out of this brand.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great gear. Only comment is that the snaps on ...
customer_reviews.text: Great gear. Only comment is that the snaps on top of the helmet don't stay secure. Had to tape them down.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Webster

customer_reviews.title: SUper great for the catcher
customer_reviews.text: Our grandson loved this and uses it every game well made
customer_reviews.author: Donald J. Maloney

customer_reviews.title: Metal hooks and rings are great
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for 9 year old boy. Fits great and room to grow. Love the metal hooks and rings on shin guards. So far holding up very well.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Carlson

customer_reviews.title: Great gear for the money
customer_reviews.text: Awesome for my 10 year old playing travel ball fits well and great protection with pitchers throwing in low to mid 40’s
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Louisville Slugger Youth PG Series 5 Catchers Set
product_meta.description: Perform at the top of your game every game. The new 2014 Louisville Slugger PGS514-STY Series 5 Youth 3-Piece Catcher's Set comes with a helmet, chest protector and shin guards. New lighter, Precision pad designed chest protector fits better than ever before and doesn't ride up when crouching. High-density foam padding deadens the ball on contact and a new over the shoulder harness enhances a form fit. More pad breaks allow the pads to better conform to the body. Perforated mesh lining with metallic mesh cover reduces weight and creates better airflow. Anatomically inspired, double-knee design allows for a better fitting shin guard and a less restricted range-of-motion. Intermediate Sizes: Chest protector; 12". Shin guards; 13". Helmet; one size (fits 6 3/8 - 7).
feature_bullets: Made from extra-tough, lightweight materials that keep you protected while easily moving with you, Louisville Sluggers Series 5 Catchers Sets keep catchers of every skill level safely in the game.
Whether you're an intermediate or youth player, the Series 5 Catchers Sets will meet your needs in a variety of color combinations.
